snippet: A national trade group has promised to provide protheses to anyone who lost a leg in the Boston Marathon bombings if they are uninsured or their insurance fails to cover the cost.
abstract: American Orthotic & Prosthetic Assn promises to provide artificial limbs to any people who lost a leg in Boston Marathon bombings if they are uninsured or if their insurance fails to cover costs.
lead_paragraph: A national trade group has promised to provide protheses to anyone who lost a leg in the Boston Marathon bombings if they are uninsured or their insurance fails to cover the cost.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Aid Promised for Victims Who Lost Limbs
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Aid Promised For Victims Who Lost Limbs
